def_cn: 刻板模仿的;毫无创意的;照搬的
def_en: You use slavish to describe things that copy or imitate something exactly, without any attempt to be original.

def_cn: 奴性十足的;俯首帖耳的
def_en: If you describe someone as slavish, you are critical of the fact that they behave like a slave, for example by always doing what another person wants.
